about_the_game:
“Draw Anywhere, With Anything.”

MediBang Paint is an art app with more than 100 million downloads in over 150 countries!

By downloading the Steam version of this beloved software, not only will you support the MediBang Paint developer team, you’ll get access to automatic updates, never deal with pop-up ads again, and be the first to receive new, Steam-exclusive features.

Gradient Map

  • Use these customizable presets to change the entire atmosphere of your art.

  • Enhance your coloring and even turn grayscale pieces full color using the Gradient Map function.

Onion Skin Mode

  • Use this convenient tool to see all your frames at once as you work on your project to ensure a seamless animation.

  • Preview in various frame rate options before exporting your set of layers into .mp4.

No Ads

  • No pop-up advertisements at the start-up of the software.

Automatic Updates

  • No need to manually update the software for every time.

Brushes, Screentones, Fonts, and more!

  • Enjoy drawing with over 180 editable brushes or even make your own.

  • Make professional comics easily using any of MediBang’s 1000 screentones and 60 fonts available.

  • Use filters, share filter settings with other MediBang friends, use fun background brushes, and access more resources to give your art a special finish.

Tools Made for Everyone from Beginner to Pro!

  • Stabilizer: A natural-feeling stabilization tool that automatically fixes any shakes or wobbles in your brushwork as you draw.

  • Assistance Tools: A multitude of perspective guides and rulers to help you plan and structure complex illustrations. Never feel confused about vanishing points again thanks to these handy tools.

  • Intuitive Transformation: Free Transform to adjust your illustration as a whole, or tweak details using Mesh Transformation.

  • Timelapse: Easily activate from the menu tab and show off your art process when you’re done! Share your speedpaints on social media with #medibangpaint and #timelapse

  • Simple Interface: MediBang Paint for Steam is a user-friendly painting app with a simple UI that lets you focus on making art over figuring out a complex interface. It won’t intimidate a beginner artist, and won’t distract a pro either!

Unlimited Device Usage

  • MediBang Paint for Steam allows users to create across multiple platforms with no restriction on the number of devices registered to one account.

  • Want to switch between desktop and mobile devices? The cloud feature in MediBang Paint for Steam lets you switch easily from drawing at home to drawing on the go.

Group Project: Keep Everyone on the Same Page

  • Draw on the same canvas with your friends! Join up to 3 teams and work together on a project, or just sketch for fun!

  • For professional comic artists, make it easier and more stress-free than ever for your team to complete pages faster together.

Further Support

  • Access our official website for step-by-step guide & illustration tutorials!

  • Check out our official YouTube channel updated twice a week!

  • Various templates and practice materials are available for free in the MediBang Library

Supported Formats

  • Supported formats: mdp (native file format*), png, jpg, bmp, gif, psd, tif, webp

*The mdp file format is also shared with Fire Alpaca and mdiapp+

*In order to use cloud features, users need to create a free MediBang account. Users will be required to accept a third-party End-User License Agreement by MediBang Inc. when creating a MediBang account.

*App performance may vary depending on the device’s condition.
